# fallback-chain-js monorepo

Tiny fallback chains for JS/TS plus a demo app (Fallback Lab).
Package name: @khalidsaidi/fallback-chain-js

## Start here
- packages/fallback-chain-js/README.md: library overview + API
- packages/fallback-chain-js/src/index.ts: implementation (tiny core)
- packages/fallback-chain-js/test/spec.js: behavioral spec
- apps/fallbacklab/README.md: demo app overview
- apps/fallbacklab/public/llms.txt: /api/run usage for tools
- apps/fallbacklab/openapi.json: OpenAPI 3.0 for /api/run and /api/runs/{id}

## Repo map
- packages/fallback-chain-js: dependency-free fallback chain primitive
- apps/fallbacklab: Next.js demo with Firebase Auth/Firestore + Vertex AI
